name: CO-BOTS
description:
Controls:

Player 1
Player 2
W (jump)
A (left) D (right)
S (use)
↑ (jump)
← (left) → (right)
↓(use)

Description:

This is my submission to the "Indie Game Dev Beginners #003" GameJam. This game currently only consists of 1 level. I started this project wanting to make a split screen co-op puzzle game. Unfortunately making good puzzles in a week is not something I'm good at. Anyways, if you play my game, thank you; I hope you can enjoy my short puzzle.

Credits:

  • J. Lewis (Developer)
  • M. Lewis (Artist)
